title: Hap ’n ’Roll: A Scroll-inspired Device for Delivering Diverse Haptic Feedback with a Single Actuator
venue: IEEE Conference on Virtual Reality and 3D User Interfaces (IEEE VR)
authors: **Hiroki Ota**, Daiki Hagimori, Monica Perusquía-Hernández, Naoya Isoyama, Hideaki Uchiyama, Kiyoshi Kiyokawa

abstract.ja: 単一アクチュエータで多様な触覚提示を実現する巻物着想のデバイスを提案する。
abstract.en: We present a scroll-inspired device that delivers diverse haptic feedback with a single actuator.
